612860.name: RTK13WPK - Collaborative set with "Sangokushi Taisen" 『三国志大戦』タイアップ武将CGセット
612860.description:
28 officer CG from the "Sangokushi Taisen" will be added.

▼Added Officer Graphics
Cao Cao/Xiahou Dun/Xiahou Yuan/Zhang Liao/Sima Yi/Pang De/Guan Yu/Wang Yi
Sun Jian/Sun Ce/Sun Quan/Zhou Yu/Taishi Ci/Gan Ning/Lu Xun/Ding Feng
Liu Bei/Zhang Fei/Zhuge Liang/Zhao Yun/Ma Chao/Huang Zhong/Sun Shangxiang/Guan Yinping
Lu Bu/Liji/Dong Zhuo/Zhang Liang

▼To Use
Select "EDIT". Under "EDIT HISTORICAL OFFICERS" select one of the applicable officers listed above. Choose "FACE" and the available face graphics will appear. Choose the appropriate graphic from the Special tab. Following this, you will be able to use it in both MAIN and HERO MODES.

※Valid only for "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIII: Fame and Strategy Expansion Pack."
612860.supported_languages:
日语*, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
